conclusion: Determine the change in magnetic flux when coil rotates 60° around z-axis.
Initially, the plane of the coil is perpendicular to the x-axis.
Area of the coil is 0.4 m² and magnetic induction intensity is 0.1 T.
Angle between the normal to the coil and the magnetic field is initially 0°.
Calculate initial magnetic flux: Φ_initial = 0.04 Wb.
After rotation, angle between normal to coil and magnetic field is 60°.
Calculate final magnetic flux: Φ_final = 0.02 Wb.
Calculate change in magnetic flux: ΔΦ = -0.02 Wb.
Final answer: Change in magnetic flux is -0.02 Wb.
